steps.name: the user is on the Commerza homepage

elements.name: View all products on products page

steps.name: the user navigates to the products page
the user should see a list of products
each product should display product image
each product should display product name
each product should display product price
the user is on the Commerza homepage
the user navigates to the products page
there are more than 12 products
the user should see pagination controls
the user clicks on next page
the user should see the next set of products
the user is on the Commerza homepage

elements.name: Search for products with valid keyword

steps.name: the user enters "Automatic" in the search box
the user clicks on search button
the user should see search results for "Automatic"
all displayed products should match the search keyword
the user is on the Commerza homepage
the user enters "NonexistentProduct" in the search box
the user clicks on search button
the user should see "No products found" message
the user is on the Commerza homepage

elements.name: Search for products with different keywords

steps.name: the user enters "Smart" in the search box
the user clicks on search button
the user should see search results for "Smart"
the user is on the Commerza homepage

elements.name: Search for products with different keywords

steps.name: the user enters "Sports" in the search box
the user clicks on search button
the user should see search results for "Sports"
the user is on the Commerza homepage

elements.name: Search for products with different keywords

steps.name: the user enters "Minimal" in the search box
the user clicks on search button
the user should see search results for "Minimal"
the user is on the Commerza homepage

elements.name: Search for products with different keywords

steps.name: the user enters "Automatic" in the search box
the user clicks on search button
the user should see search results for "Automatic"
the user is on the Commerza homepage
the user navigates to the products page
the user selects "Smart Watches" category
the user should see only products from "Smart Watches" category
the category filter should be highlighted
the user is on the Commerza homepage

elements.name: View products in specific category page

steps.name: the user clicks on "Sports Watches" category link
the user should be on category page for "Sports"
the user should see products from "Sports" category only
the user is on the Commerza homepage
the user navigates to "shop-category-a.html"
the user should see category A products
the user clicks on category B link
the user should see category B products
the user is on the Commerza homepage
the user navigates to the products page
the user clicks on a product
the user should see the product details page
the product details should include product name
the product details should include product price
the product details should include product description
the product details should include product images
the user should see "Add to Cart" button
the user should see "Add to Wishlist" button
the user is on the Commerza homepage
the user is on a product details page
the product has multiple images
the user should see image thumbnails
the user clicks on a thumbnail
the main product image should change
the user is on the Commerza homepage
the user navigates to the products page
the user sets minimum price to "1000"
the user sets maximum price to "5000"
the user applies price filter
all displayed products should be within price range
the user is on the Commerza homepage
the user navigates to the products page
the user selects sort by "Price: Low to High"
the products should be sorted by "Price: Low to High"
the user is on the Commerza homepage
the user navigates to the products page
the user selects sort by "Price: High to Low"
the products should be sorted by "Price: High to Low"
the user is on the Commerza homepage
the user navigates to the products page
the user selects sort by "Name: A to Z"
the products should be sorted by "Name: A to Z"
the user is on the Commerza homepage
the user navigates to the products page
the user selects sort by "Name: Z to A"
the products should be sorted by "Name: Z to A"
the user is on the Commerza homepage
the user navigates to the products page
the user selects sort by "Newest First"
the products should be sorted by "Newest First"
the user is on the Commerza homepage

elements.name: Add product to wishlist from product listing

steps.name: the user is logged in with email "testuser@commerza.com" and password "Test@123"
the user navigates to the products page
the user clicks on wishlist icon for a product
the product should be added to wishlist
the user should see wishlist confirmation message
the user is on the Commerza homepage

elements.name: Add product to wishlist from product details

steps.name: the user is logged in with email "testuser@commerza.com" and password "Test@123"
the user is on a product details page
the user clicks on "Add to Wishlist" button
the product should be added to wishlist
the wishlist icon should be filled
the user is on the Commerza homepage
the user is logged in with email "testuser@commerza.com" and password "Test@123"
the user has products in wishlist
the user navigates to wishlist page
the user should see all wishlisted products
each product should have "Remove" option
each product should have "Add to Cart" option
the user is on the Commerza homepage
the user is logged in with email "testuser@commerza.com" and password "Test@123"
the user has products in wishlist
the user navigates to wishlist page
the user clicks on remove button for a product
the product should be removed from wishlist
the user should see removal confirmation
the user is on the Commerza homepage
the user navigates to the products page
the user clicks on wishlist icon for a product
the user should be prompted to login
the user is on the Commerza homepage
the user navigates to the products page
the user clicks on compare icon for first product
the user clicks on compare icon for second product
the user should see compare notification with count "2"
the user is on the Commerza homepage
the user has products in compare list
the user navigates to compare page
the user should see comparison table
the table should show product specifications
each product should have "Add to Cart" button
each product should have "Remove" button
the user is on the Commerza homepage
the user has products in compare list
the user navigates to compare page
the user removes a product from comparison
the product should be removed from comparison table
the compare count should be updated
the user is on the Commerza homepage
the user adds 4 products to compare
the user tries to add 5th product to compare
the user should see message "Maximum 4 products can be compared"
the user is on the Commerza homepage
the user views a product that is in stock
the product should show "In Stock" status
the "Add to Cart" button should be enabled
the user is on the Commerza homepage
the user views a product that is out of stock
the product should show "Out of Stock" status
the "Add to Cart" button should be disabled
the user should see "Notify Me" option

name: Product Browsing and Search
description:
As a customer
  I want to browse and search for products
  So that I can find products I want to purchase
